prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Organ, Drums, Piano, Brass, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the sounds of Guitar, Organ, Drums, Piano, and Brass, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Organ, Drums, Piano, and Brass, but Bass is absent.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Organ, Drums, Piano, and Brass, omitting Bass.
